summary: An undercover agent is sent to investigate dope smuggling on a sun-drenched Mediterranean island. When both of his principal subjects die in mysterious reasons, he soon finds that he is also involved in a murder investigation.
cast: Mark Burns|Shaun Curry|William Dexter|Wanda Ventham|Terence de Marney|Mark Singleton|Michael Brennan|Blake Butler|Dulcie Bowman|Tony Watham|Anita Harris|Garth Adams|Caron Gardner|Trisha Noble|Jim O'Brady
title: Death Is a Woman
